t001.desc: Design WhatsApp Business API architecture and webhook system
t001.acceptance: API webhook receives photos, validates Business API integration

t002.desc: Design dual OCR provider architecture (Google Vision + Azure fallback)
t002.acceptance: Provider abstraction layer with failover logic documented

t003.desc: Design secure receipt image storage with AES-256 encryption
t003.acceptance: S3 bucket with CloudFront, encryption at rest specification

t004.desc: Design PostgreSQL time-series schema for spending analytics
t004.acceptance: Database schema supports efficient spending queries and aggregations

t005.desc: Design Redis caching and queue architecture for async processing
t005.acceptance: Queue priority system for free vs premium processing

t006.desc: Define Spanish-first business taxonomy and cultural categories
t006.acceptance: Cultural category taxonomy with Hispanic spending patterns mapped

t007.desc: Create Hispanic family persona validation framework
t007.acceptance: User interview scripts and validation metrics for cultural authenticity

t008.desc: Design freemium business model with OXXO cash payment integration
t008.acceptance: Pricing tiers and payment flow supporting Mexican payment preferences

t009.desc: Implement WhatsApp webhook API endpoints with photo processing
t009.acceptance: Webhook receives photos, queues processing, returns confirmation <200ms

t010.desc: Build Flask microservice for receipt upload and validation
t010.acceptance: API handles photo upload with validation, stores securely in S3

t011.desc: Implement Google Vision OCR integration with error handling
t011.acceptance: OCR service extracts text with >90% accuracy on Mexican receipts

t012.desc: Build Azure Computer Vision fallback OCR service
t012.acceptance: Automatic fallback when Google Vision fails, maintains p95 <45s

t013.desc: Create PostgreSQL models for receipts, users, and spending data
t013.acceptance: Database models support receipt storage and spending analytics queries

t014.desc: Build Redis queue management for async OCR processing
t014.acceptance: Queue handles batch processing with priority levels and monitoring

t015.desc: Implement Mexican receipt format parser for line items
t015.acceptance: Parser extracts date, merchant, items, prices, tax from Mexican receipts

t016.desc: Build Spanish ML categorization service with user feedback
t016.acceptance: >87% automated categorization accuracy with learning feedback loop

t017.desc: Create React Native mobile app with camera integration
t017.acceptance: Mobile app captures receipts, offline queuing, Spanish interface

t018.desc: Build React web dashboard with spending analytics
t018.acceptance: Web dashboard loads <1.5s, displays spending trends in pesos

t019.desc: Implement JWT authentication and user management system
t019.acceptance: Secure API authentication with user registration and login

t020.acceptance: Notifications sent via preferred channel with Spanish content

t021.desc: Create comprehensive test suite for OCR accuracy validation
t021.acceptance: Test suite validates >90% OCR accuracy with Mexican receipt corpus

t022.desc: Implement security testing for PII protection and encryption
t022.acceptance: Security audit passes OWASP Top 10, no PII leakage

t023.desc: Build performance testing for p95 <45s processing target
t023.acceptance: Performance tests validate end-to-end processing under load

t024.desc: Create accessibility testing for WCAG AA compliance
t024.acceptance: Accessibility audit passes WCAG AA with screen reader support

t025.acceptance: Cultural validation tests ensure appropriate Hispanic financial messaging

t026.desc: Validate Maria persona workflow: WhatsApp receipt scanning in <30s
t026.acceptance: Working parent can scan receipt via WhatsApp in under 30 seconds

t027.desc: Test Carlos persona workflow: batch business expense processing
t027.acceptance: Small business owner can batch process receipts and export for taxes

t028.desc: Validate Ana persona workflow: free tier budget tracking
t028.acceptance: Student can track spending on free tier with family sharing

t029.desc: Test real-world Hispanic family usage patterns and pain points
t029.acceptance: Hispanic families achieve 65% monthly active usage in pilot

t030.desc: Validate Mexican receipt format diversity across regions
t030.acceptance: Receipt parser handles format variations from northern/southern Mexico

t031.desc: Measure and optimize for 87% time reduction goal (15min→2min)

t032.desc: Track spending awareness improvement from 77% to 92%
t032.acceptance: Pre/post surveys show 15 percentage point awareness improvement

t033.desc: Optimize for 65% monthly active receipt scanning retention
t033.acceptance: Monthly cohort analysis shows sustainable scanning habits

t034.desc: Plan alpha rollout strategy for 100 users in LA/Houston
t034.acceptance: Alpha rollout plan with success metrics and escalation criteria

t035.desc: Implement Stripe integration with OXXO cash payment support
t035.acceptance: Payment processing supports Mexican cash payment preferences

t036.desc: Design auto-scaling infrastructure for 15K user capacity
t036.acceptance: Infrastructure scales automatically to handle growth phases

t037.desc: Implement GDPR/INAI compliance for Mexican privacy regulations
t037.acceptance: Privacy controls meet Mexican data protection requirements

t038.desc: Build family expense sharing and aggregation features
t038.acceptance: Multi-generational household expense coordination and sharing

t039.desc: Test 3G network performance optimization for mobile users
t039.acceptance: App performs well on Mexican mobile networks with data constraints

t040.desc: Establish Hispanic advisory board for cultural validation
t040.acceptance: Advisory board provides ongoing cultural authenticity validation

risks.desc: OCR accuracy degradation with poor image quality
